name: Ensemble optimization
description: Script for ensemble optimization using SMACdown

inputs.name: dataset-id
inputs.description: Dataset for which we are seeking an optimal ensemble

inputs.name: objective-id
inputs.description: The ensemble's objective field, or empty to use the dataset's default

inputs.name: metric
inputs.description: Evaluation metric that we want to optimize.  It must be a number

inputs.name: prefix
inputs.description: Prefix for the name of created resources.  If empty, all intermediate resources will be deleted
